Package logic.model

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.model.Player
  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Player-class. Describes one of the two players which plays a Marvelous MashUp game.
    Author:
    Adrian Groeber, Matthias Ruf

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      Hero[] playerTeam  
      Profile profile
      The profile associated with the player object
      Role role
      The role of the player.
      boolean selectionConfirmed
      The selectionConfirmed Boolean is true if the player has confirmed his Hero selection, else it is false
      ConfigHero[] teamOptions
      The Array of ConfigHeroes which is sent to the player in the GameAssignment message to choose his Heroes from.
      SimpleTimer timeoutTimer
      A timer to limit the time a player is able to reconnect after a connection loss
      java.util.ArrayList<Message> wrongMessage  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Player​(Profile profile, Role role)
      The constructor of the Player class. it uses the profile of a connected client to create a new player object before a new game model is created.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean oneOfMyHeroes​(Hero checkHero)
      Checks if a certain Hero is part of the team of this Player object.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • role

        public Role role
        The role of the player. It is either a PLAYER or a KI

      • playerTeam

        public Hero[] playerTeam

      • teamOptions

        public ConfigHero[] teamOptions
        The Array of ConfigHeroes which is sent to the player in the GameAssignment message to choose his Heroes from.

      • wrongMessage

        public java.util.ArrayList<Message> wrongMessage

      • profile

        public Profile profile
        The profile associated with the player object

      • selectionConfirmed

        public boolean selectionConfirmed
        The selectionConfirmed Boolean is true if the player has confirmed his Hero selection, else it is false

      • timeoutTimer

        public SimpleTimer timeoutTimer
        A timer to limit the time a player is able to reconnect after a connection loss

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player​(Profile profile,
              Role role)
        The constructor of the Player class. it uses the profile of a connected client to create a new player object before a new game model is created.
        Parameters:
        profile - the profile of the client who will play the game as a player.
        role - the role of the player (KI or PLAYER)

    • Method Detail

      • oneOfMyHeroes

        public boolean oneOfMyHeroes​(Hero checkHero)
        Checks if a certain Hero is part of the team of this Player object.
        Parameters:
        checkHero - Hero to search for
        Returns:
        True, if checkHero belongs to this player
